title: sokani
author: sokani
content: Author: [banned mixer]Original topic: [banned mixer] - Premium Bitcoin Mixer | Launched in 2018 üõ°Ô∏èQuote from: ¬† ‚û• Your privacy matter /?faq][FAQ] ‚û• Try/?mix=free][Free Mixing] & /][Tor Version]  ‚û• [banned mixer] Public Key/pgp-key.txt][Check out] & /#contacts][Contact]/?mix]Bitcoin Mixer /][banned mixer] na one-of-a-kind bitcoin mixer wey dem build on [banned mixer] platform and com launch am for August, 2018. Wen mixing BTC, /][banned mixer] no dey shuffle funds wey dey available for one or multiple pots, but e dey exchange incoming bitcoins with coins wey investors purchase from - cryptocurrency stock exchanges.NavigationI fit trust you with my money?Wetin be de min amount and commission costs?How [banned mixer] fit guarantee my anonymity?How long addresses for fund transfer dey remain valid?How long e dey take to cleanse Bitcoins?How free trial mixing dey work?How I fit take create my own Bitcoin mixer?Wetin be [banned mixer] project?Our transfer algorithm dey select independent investors and trading platforms, and dey break down your funds in a manner wey dey completely remove de link between input and output transactions. We no dey require registration and we no dey store logs. Once our mixing don dey complete and transaction don dey confirmed, we dey delete de data for processed transactions. For each mixing request, we dey issue digital signed letter of guarantee wey confirm our obligations to client. Code:Telegtam: https://t.me/mixtum_botMixTum Tor Mirror: https://[banned mixer]/[banned mixer] PGP fingerprint: B8A5 CFCA F63F F2D8 384A 6B12 D3B2 8095 6F0E 7CAFI fit trust you with my money?In addition to de fact say we don dey for this market for more than 4 years, we dey take protective measures against errors and malicious acts. For every incoming order, we dey provide a PGP-signed letter of guarantee wey dey confirm our obligations. To check letter of guarantee, make you install PGP client (for example, PGP4Win), import /pgp-key.txt]public key of [banned mixer] from de website to de installed client and verify de digital signature.Wetin be de min amount and commission costs?De commission dey random to some extent and e fit be 4-5% + 0.0007 BTC. De innovative cleansing process we dey use dey involve some considerable expenses, but we believe say de resulting premium anonymization level worth de price. Minimum amount of funds for cleansing na 0.005 BTC. We dey regard smaller transactions as donation since e no make any business sense to conduct dem, but if you send such amount by mistake, /#contacts]contact our help desk.How [banned mixer] fit guarantee my anonymity?We no dey collect logs, we no dey store private information, our team also dey anonymous. De main principle of de platform operation na to provide funds to end customers from hundred different investors from various stock exchanges. We dey delete all de info about an order wen e don reach completion (or wen de offer don expire). De only remaining trace of our work na de letters of guarantee wey we dey give you.To increase de level of anonymity, you fit use de Tor version of de platform, (de Tor version no dey use JavaScript, e no dey collect and store any records of website visitor activity). MixTum get official Tor mirror of de website wey you fit find under de following /]link.How long addresses for fund transfer dey remain valid?E dey remain valid for 7 days. Dis period dey enough to address any network issues, delays and human errors wey fit occur, thus e dey guarantee safety of customer's assets. Anyway, every cases get an address lifetime for every request wey dey captured in de letter of guarantee wey [banned mixer] platform dey provide.How long e dey take to cleanse Bitcoins?De process dey start after de first confirmation of your incoming transfer and e dey take up to 6 hours. We dey choose de exact delay randomly in order to resist deanonymization attempts. We don find out say a random delay of up to 6 hours dey enough to eliminate de risk of volume analysis.How your free trial mixing dey work?You fit initiate trial mixing by de respective button on de main page, or follow /?mix=free]this link. We no go charge commission for cleansing, but you must send us exactly 0.001 BTC. You no fit select a percentage breakdown as na de algorithm dey decide for optimal performance and anonymity.¬† How I fit take create my own Bitcoin mixer? [/faq.php#faq-2.1]Extended FAQ]E dey very simple! You no need to implement mixer algorithms by yourself or seek for finance to form operating assets, we go do am for you.‚û• Register on de [banned mixer] website as a partner, specify de BTC wallet wey you go take receive profit and your mixer commission, configure automated withdrawal of funds and enter your project name. Na de platform go generate BTC addresses, issue letters of guarantee on your behalf, control monetary flows and transfer profits to you.‚û• Develop de website design of your own mixer or use template wey we don prepare for you. For your personal account you fit find HTML templates for Tor and Clearnet mixer version, PHP gateway wey you go take connect to our system. Download and upload dem to your hosting.‚û• Your mixer don dey ready for operation, wetin remain for you to do na to attract clients. You go get interest income from every transaction. You go get Jabber or Telegram notifications of new requests and transaction execution through your mixer from de platform.
